name: 8.7 "Death Takes a Holiday on Ice" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was Carla excited to see at Cheers?
questions.explanation:
Darryl Mead.

	Darryl Mead was a Boston Red Sox player on the show. In real life he was not one, much like Sam Malone. Darryl Mead was played by Kevin Conroy.

questions.text: Why couldn't Carla go out with the man?
questions.explanation:
She's married.

	Carla said she didn't get any of the perks of being marriage because Eddie was always gone with the ice show. Carla loved Eddie but was fed up with his being gone so many months at a time.

questions.text: What did Carla say Eddie's excuse for not going to graduation was?
options: He couldn't get time off of work.
He never cared much for that particular child.
questions.explanation:
He was dead.

	Eddie worked as a penguin for an ice show. Someone called her from the show to let her know Eddie had been killed.

the Zamboni machine.

	A Zamboni is the machine that makes the ice smooth again after people have been skating on it. Eddie pushed another player out of the way from being hit and in doing so he was hit and killed by the machine.

questions.text: What was wrong at the funeral?
questions.explanation:
Eddie had two wives.

	This caused some very comical moments as each wife came forward. The priest then asked for "the current Mrs. LeBec" and once again they both came forward. This caused a fight to break out at the funeral.

questions.text: What was the name of the woman at the funeral?
questions.explanation:
Gloria.

	Gloria LeBec was played by Anne De Salvo. Not only is she an actress, she is also a director.

questions.text: What was on top of the casket?
questions.explanation:
a penguin head.

	The penguin head was part of Eddie's uniform. His former hockey players (he once played with the Boston Bruins) all brought their hockey sticks in and tapped the casket with them.

questions.correct: Carla and the other woman both
options: Neither Carla or the other woman
questions.explanation:
Carla and the other woman both.

	Carla's twins are Jesse and Elvis. She had them in season six. We are not told who Gloria's twins are, only that she had them.

questions.text: Who got hit by Rebecca when the fight broke out at the funeral?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	She said she thought he was one of the ice people. She apologized to Woody and then complained that when you punch a couple of people out at a funeral people get all over you.

questions.text: Who gave Carla a note from Eddie?
questions.explanation:
Gordie Brown.

	Gordie was played by Thomas Haydn Church best known for his role as Lowell on "Wings". Gordie was the man whose life Eddie saved. The note said that Eddie got another woman pregnant and had to marry her. However, he said Carla was his true love.
